i love you man so much for creating this. I always wanted to read one of my favorite fanfics and even if its not cannon I'm so happy that there is such a thing as this. Thank you for this, my reasoning is that I only read monogatari just for the sole purpose of shinobu and araragi relationship but unfortunately I couldn't find one until I found this which made me so happy but even so I'm still grateful and blessed for this beautiful masterpiece. I just wanna tell you how much this means to me. I know its stupid of me for being crazy of this master piece but you just have to know your better than half of these creators of this platform just for perfecting a awesome porn. Well farewell to you, homunculus and a third time or maybe 4th I don't remember of saying this but thank you so much i needed this. This gave me soo much hope for humanity and my future giving me a other chance at life. And as you know reading this i do indeed love shinobu oshino.i know I'm repeating it alot but thanks

See... I love Araragi and Shinobu's relationship. It's the main reason why I love Monogatari.

"We will live until we die."

It's basically how their relationship is. It may sound cheesy to most people, but both of them do live until they die, for however long that may be.

This doujin is basically a cherry on top of how I love them. Eternal life, Shinobu feels guilty to bring Araragi along, and Araragi reaffirms himself that it's his wish to live with her.

Best Monogatari doujin. Canon undisputed.

150 years... shinobu and araragi eternity , with children ,kagenui and ononoki lives to kill inmortal creatures, warning araragi in owarimonogatari 2,if he become vampire kill araragi, kiss shot live and suicide
